name: Sleepy Friends and The Beast
description:
Game Loop:

  1. Runaway from the Beast!
  2. Find and Wake up one of your friends to help.
  3. Shoot the beast
  4. Repeat
  5. Shoot boxes for health and a better fire rate
  6. Don't die

Controls: 

  • MOVE: WASD/Arrow Keys 
  • JUMP: Space 
  • DASH: Shift
  • SHOOT: Click and Hold Mouse
